span.span: ATTENTION:Â GOVERNORÂ GREGG ABBOTT HAS EXTENDED THE ORDERÂ CLOSINGÂ ALL TEXAS SCHOOLS FOR THE REMAINDER OF THE 2019-2020 SCHOOL YEAR.Â REMOTE INSTRUCTION WILL CONTINUE THROUGHÂ MAY 21, 2020.Â MORE INFORMATION WILL BE PROVIDED IN THE COMING DAYS AS IT BECOMES AVAILABLE.Â PLEASE CONTINUE TO FOLLOW STATE AND NATIONAL HEALTH RECOMMENDATIONS DURING THIS TIME.

ATTENCION:Â EL GOBERNADOR GREGG ABBOTT HA EXTENDIDO EL PEDIDO CERRANDO TODAS LAS ESCUELAS DE TEXAS POR EL RESTO DEL AÃ‘O ESCOLAR 2019-2020. LA INSTRUCCIÃ“N REMOTA CONTINUARÃ HASTA EL 21 DE MAYO DE 2020. SE PROPORCIONARÃ MÃS INFORMACIÃ“N EN LOS DÃAS SIGUIENTES A medida que estÃ© disponible. CONTINÃšE PARA SEGUIR LAS RECOMENDACIONES DE SALUD ESTATALES Y NACIONALES DURANTE ESTE TIEMPO.

span.span: Thank you for visiting the Flatonia Independent School District website.Â Whether you are considering relocating your family or you currently live in our school community, we understand how important a quality school system is to you and your family.Â Flatonia ISD consists of highly motivated educators who work alongside supportive parents and community volunteers to provide our amazing students with a safe and supportive educational environment that allows for continued success.Â It is through the high expectations we have for our students and staff that we promote continued excellence and equity in education.Â As a school community, we are committed to providing a quality educational experience to every child who walks through our doors.Â

As you visit our website and learn more about Flatonia ISD and the educational opportunities we offer, I hope you will also gain an understanding of the tremendous value we have for the children of our community.

img.style: height: 136px; width: 105px; margin-left: 10px; margin-right: 10px; float: left;

div.class: custom_35333 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated 0
custom_34890 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated 0

span.span: Flatonia ISD inspires excellence and nurtures success by working collaboratively with staff, parents, and community members to provide a safe learning environment where students are motivated and challenged to become independent problem solvers who contribute to and lead their community, country, and world with integrity.
